original_text: Jesus took the 12 disciples away from the other people. ‘Listen!’ he said to them. ‘We are going to Jerusalem. There, many bad things will happen to me. All the things that God's prophets wrote down long ago about the Son of Man will now happen to me.
korean_text: 예수께서 열두 제자를 데리시고 이르시되 보라 우리가 예루살렘으로 올라가노니 선지자들을 통하여 기록된 모든 것이 인자에게 응하리라

sentences.original_text: There, many bad things will happen to me
sentences.korean_translation: 거기서 나에게 많은 나쁜 일들이 일어날 것이다

sentences.original_text: All the things that God's prophets wrote down
long ago about the Son of Man
